sentences.en: ...a just and tolerant society which rejects xenophobia and racism.

sentences.en: a campaign against racism and xenophobia

sentences.en: Excessive patriotism can lead to xenophobia.
sentences.cn: 爱国主义过了头即可导致仇视一切外国人.

sentences.en: Just as strikingly, the decline of empire has repeatedly coincided with intolerance and xenophobia.
sentences.cn: 令人吃惊的是, 帝国的衰落多次与不宽容和排外巧合在一起.

sentences.en: Mr Le Pen has always played on these, blending xenophobia with an anti - establishment message.
sentences.cn: 勒庞总是利用这些, 将 反 体制信息同仇外混到一起.

sentences.en: There should be no place for racism and xenophobia in this globalized world.
sentences.cn: 在这个全球化的世界里,种族主义和仇外情绪是不应存在的.

sentences.en: They are nationalist to the point of xenophobia.
sentences.cn: 他们的民族主义情绪达到了恐外症的程度.

sentences.en: This is not a time for xenophobia.
When the refugee arrived in America, he was unprepared for xenophobia he found there.
sentences.cn: 当这个难民到达美洲的时候, 他对于当地那种对异乡人的仇视毫无准备.
